Token.Abstract: XMMEnduserApi is the main part of the xamoom-ios-sdk. You can use it to send api request to the xamoom-api.
The base url of xamoom api. (readonly)
The base url of xamoom api. (readonly)
The base url of xamoom api. (readonly)
The preferred language of the user.
The preferred language of the user.
The preferred language of the user.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
String with the title of the qr code view cancel button.
A shared instance from XMMEnduserApi.
Inits the XMMEnduserApi: generates the apiBaseUrl and the rssBaseUrl and gets the preferred systemLanguage.
Set your API Key from the xamoom-system.
Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique contentId. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithContentId:(NSString *)contentId includeStyle:(BOOL)style includeMenu:(BOOL)menu withLanguage:(NSString *)language full:(BOOL)full completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMResponseGetById *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: contentId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the content from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the style from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: menu
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the menu from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: full
Parameter.Abstract: True or false for returning "unsynced" data or not

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseGetById

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique locationIdentifier (code saved on NFC or QR). If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithLocationIdentifier:(NSString *)locationIdentifier includeStyle:(BOOL)style includeMenu:(BOOL)menu withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMResponseGetByLocationIdentifier *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: locationIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The locationidentifier (code saved on NFC or QR) of the marker from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: style
Parameter.Abstract: True or False for returning the style from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: menu
Parameter.Abstract: True of False for returning the menu from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseGetByLocationIdentifier

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a location (lat & lon). If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentWithLat:(NSString *)lat withLon:(NSString *)lon withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMResponseGetByLocation *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Abstract: The latitude of a location.

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Abstract: The longitude of a location.

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseGetByLocation

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with params to get a list of all items, so you can show them on a map.

Parameter.Name: mapTags
Parameter.Abstract: The Tags of the wanted spots.

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseGetSpotMap

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Parameter.Name: systemId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the wanted system.

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a unique contentId. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentListWithPageSize:(int)pageSize withLanguage:(NSString *)language withCursor:(NSString *)cursor withTags:(NSArray *)tags completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMResponseContentList *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: Number of items you will get returned

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Cursor for paging

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: Tags as an array

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseContentList

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Parameter.Name: systemId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the system from xamoom.

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom with a location and returns the closest spots. If the selected language is not available the default language will be returned.
Token.Declaration: - (void)closestSpotsWithLat:(float)lat withLon:(float)lon withRadius:(int)radius withLimit:(int)limit withLanguage:(NSString *)language completion:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMResponseClosestSpot *result ))completionHandler error:(void ( ^ ) ( XMMError *error ))errorHandler

Parameter.Name: lat
Parameter.Abstract: Latitude

Parameter.Name: lon
Parameter.Abstract: Longitude

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: Radius in decimenter

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: Limit of the results

Parameter.Name: language
Parameter.Abstract: The requested language of the content from xamoom backend

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
CompletionHandler returns the result
- param1 result The result from xamoom backend as XMMResponseClosestSpot

Parameter.Name: errorHandler
Parameter.Abstract:
ErrorHandler returns an error if one occures
- param1 error A XMMError with error informations

Token.Abstract: Makes an api call to xamoom when a user clicks a geofenced content for analytics.
Token.Declaration: - (void)geofenceAnalyticsMessageWithRequestedLanguage:(NSString *)requestedLanguage withDeliveredLanguage:(NSString *)deliveredLanguage withSystemId:(NSString *)systemId withSystemName:(NSString *)sytemName withContentId:(NSString *)contentId withContentName:(NSString *)contentName withSpotId:(NSString *)spotId withSpotName:(NSString *)spotName

Token.Abstract: Starts the QRCodeReaderViewController to scan qr codes.

Parameter.Name: viewController
Parameter.Abstract: The ViewController from where you want to call the QRCodeReader (usually self)

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: CompletionHandler returns the result - param1 locationIdentifier NSString with only the locaitionIdentifier of the scanned QR - param2 url NSString wiht the complete scanned url
